verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi become בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, Now it came to pass in the seventh בָּ֣א <WH935> ba with him came יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El [that] Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֣ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <WH476> 'e-li-sha-Ma' of Elishama מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed הַ֠מְּלוּכָה <WH4410> Ham-me-lu-chah royal וְרַבֵּ֨י <WH7227> ve-rab-Bei and the princes הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech of the king וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> va-'a-sa-Rah even ten אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim men אִתּ֛וֹ <WH854> it-To for אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <WH296> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pa-tah; to Mizpah וַיֹּ֨אכְלוּ <WH398> vai-Yo-che-lu and there they did eat שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham there לֶ֛חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> yach-Dav together בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah. Mizpah

וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> vai-ya-Kam Then arose יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֜ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> va-'a-Se-ret and the ten הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים׀ <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וַ֠יַּכּוּ <WH5221> Vai-yak-ku that were with him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֧ם <WH296> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שָׁפָ֛ן <WH8227> sha-Fan of Shaphan בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev with the sword וַיָּ֣מֶת <WH4191> vai-Ya-met and slew אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom הִפְקִ֥יד <WH6485> hif-Kid had made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- him whom the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. over the land

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <WH3064> hai-ye-hu-Dim, all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הָי֨וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become אִתּ֤וֹ <WH854> it-To for אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu that were with him [even] with Gedaliah בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah, at Mizpah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> hak-kas-Dim and the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> nim-tze-'u- that were found שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; there אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> 'an-Shei there [and] the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah, of war הִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> hik-Kah also slew יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> yish-ma-'El. Ishmael

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni And it came to pass the second לְהָמִ֣ית <WH4191> le-ha-Mit after he had slain אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֑הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu; Gedaliah וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish and no man לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no יָדָֽע׃ <WH3045> ya-Da'. knew

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u That there came אֲ֠נָשִׁים <WH376> 'A-na-shim men מִשְּׁכֶ֞ם <WH7927> mish-she-Chem from Shechem מִשִּׁל֤וֹ <WH7887> mish-shi-Lo from Shiloh וּמִשֹּֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <WH8111> u-mish-sho-me-rOn and from Samaria שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> she-mo-Nim [even] fourscore אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, men מְגֻלְּחֵ֥י <WH1548> me-gul-le-Chei shaven זָקָ֛ן <WH2206> za-Kan having their beards וּקְרֻעֵ֥י <WH7167> u-ke-ru-'Ei rent בְגָדִ֖ים <WH899> ve-ga-Dim and their clothes וּמִתְגֹּֽדְדִ֑ים <WH1413> u-mit-go-de-Dim; and having cut וּמִנְחָ֤ה <WH4503> u-min-Chah themselves with offerings וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <WH3828> u-le-vo-Nah and incense בְּיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> be-ya-Dam, in their hand לְהָבִ֖יא <WH935> le-ha-Vi to bring בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit [them] to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַ֠יֵּצֵא <WH3318> Vai-ye-tze went forth יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El And Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֤ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah לִקְרָאתָם֙ <WH7125> lik-ra-Tam to meet מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah, from Mizpah הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech all along הָלֹ֖ךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch as he went וּבֹכֶ֑ה <WH1058> u-vo-Cheh; them weeping וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כִּפְגֹ֣שׁ <WH6298> kif-Gosh and it came to pass as he met אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer them he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to בֹּ֖אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u unto them Come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <WH296> 'a-chi-Kam. of Ahikam ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> vay-Hi turned כְּבוֹאָ֖ם <WH935> ke-vo-'Am And it was [so] when they came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch into the midst הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; of the city וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֞ם <WH7819> vai-yish-cha-Tem slew יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El that Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָה֙ <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah of Nethaniah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> Toch them [and cast them] into the midst הַבּ֔וֹר <WH953> hab-Bor, of the pit ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim and the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> it-To. But

וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> va-'a-sa-Rah But ten אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim men נִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> nim-tze-'u- were found בָ֗ם Vam, וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru among them that said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> yish-ma-'eL unto Ishmael אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תְּמִתֵ֔נוּ <WH4191> te-mi-Te-nu, Slay כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- us not for we have לָ֤נוּ La-nu מַטְמֹנִים֙ <WH4301> mat-mo-Nim treasures בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field חִטִּ֥ים <WH2406> chit-Tim of wheat וּשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> u-se-'o-Rim and of barley וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> ve-She-men and of oil וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash; and of honey וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <WH2308> vai-yech-Dal So he forbare וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not הֱמִיתָ֖ם <WH4191> he-mi-Tam and slew בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch them not among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem. their brethren

וְהַבּ֗וֹר <WH953> ve-hab-Bor, Now the pit אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <WH7993> hish-Lich had cast שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> sham in it יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> yish-ma-'eL wherein Ishmael אֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פִּגְרֵ֣י <WH6297> pig-Rei all the dead bodies הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִכָּה֙ <WH5221> hik-Kah whom he had slain בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- because גְּדַלְיָ֔הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu, of Gedaliah ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> 'a-Sah had made הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king אָסָ֔א <WH609> 'a-Sa, [was] it which Asa מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei for fear בַּעְשָׁ֣א <WH1201> ba'-Sha of Baasha מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, מִלֵּ֛א <WH4390> mil-Le filled יִשְׁמָעֵ֥אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El [and] Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֖הוּ <WH5418> ne-tan-Ya-hu of Nethaniah חֲלָלִֽים׃ <WH2491> cha-la-Lim. it with [them that were] slain

וַיִּ֣שְׁבְּ׀ <WH7617> vai-Yishb carried away captive יִ֠שְׁמָעֵאל <WH3458> Yish-ma-'el Then Ishmael אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit all the residue הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בַּמִּצְפָּ֗ה <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah, that [were] in Mizpah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנ֤וֹת <WH1323> be-Not daughters הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech [even] the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <WH7604> han-nish-'a-Rim that remained בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah, in Mizpah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִפְקִ֗יד <WH6485> hif-Kid, had committed נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <WH5018> ne-vu-zar-'a-Dan whom Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> rav- the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> tab-ba-Chim, of the guard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH1436> ge-dal-Ya-hu to Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחִיקָ֑ם <WH296> 'a-chi-Kam; of Ahikam וַיִּשְׁבֵּם֙ <WH7617> vai-yish-Bem carried them away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El and Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֔ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah, of Nethaniah וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and proceeded לַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> la-'a-Vor to go over אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' that [were] with him heard יוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan But when Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> ka-Re-ach, of Kareah וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> ha-cha-ya-Lim of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> it-To; for אֵ֤ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah of all the evil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, had done יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El that Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָֽה׃ <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah. of Nethaniah

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu Then they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> vai-Ye-le-Chu, and went לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El with Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֑ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah; of Nethaniah וַיִּמְצְא֣וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tze-'U and found אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> rab-Bim him by the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher is in בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> be-giv-'on. that [are] in Gibeon

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כִּרְא֤וֹת <WH7200> kir-'ot saw כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am Now it came to pass [that] when all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- were with יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El, which [were] with Ishmael אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> ka-Re-ach, of Kareah וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <WH2428> ha-cha-ya-Lim of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> it-To; for וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <WH8055> vai-yis-Ma-chu. that [were] with him then they were glad

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> vai-ya-Sob-bu cast about כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, So all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom שָׁבָ֥ה <WH7617> sha-Vah had carried away captive יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> yish-ma-'El that Ishmael מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah; from Mizpah וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu and returned וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> vai-Ye-le-Chu, and went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- unto יֽוֹחָנָ֖ן <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan unto Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קָרֵֽחַ׃ <WH7143> ka-Re-ach. of Kareah

וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> ve-yish-ma-'El But Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֗ה <WH5418> ne-tan-Yah, of Nethaniah נִמְלַט֙ <WH4422> nim-Lat escaped בִּשְׁמֹנָ֣ה <WH8083> bish-mo-Nah with eight אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim, men מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from יֽוֹחָנָ֑ן <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan; Johanan וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and went אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon ס sa-Mek
